result.title: Final Report on the barriers (and addressing thereof) to the application of grouping and Safety-by-Design Concepts.
result.description: Content: This report will provide an summary of the results from the workshops, the survey and case studies in terms of the barriers to implementation of the SbD concepts how these barriers have been or can be addressed. Impact: SbD concepts can only be successfully introduced if accepted by relevant stakeholders. Early identification of the barriers to implementing such concepts will be critical in the acceptance and ensure that the SbD concepts and tools and SOPs are realistic.

result.title: Detailed Definition of the EUXDAT Pilots and Qualification Method v1
result.description: This report contains a detailed description of the pilots, including information about the algorithms to be used, the data sources required and the way to make use of the EUXDAT e-Infrastructure for implementing each pilot. It also provides information about the way in which the pilots will be used for qualifying EUXDAT components as TRL8.

result.title: Detailed Specification of the End Users’ Platform v2
result.description: This report will detail the solutions to be implemented in the second version of the end user prototyping platform, the data and tools/process catalogues, the supported data connectors, the available data processing tools and the datasets quality mechanism. It will include a detailed architecture of the whole End Users’ Platform, with the necessary sequence diagrams describing the platform’s operational scenarios.

result.title: Performance Evaluation and Lessons Learnt
result.description: Analysis of the feedback gained by the citizens and system engineers, through the evaluation protocol procedures, during the pilots execution and operation phase. In detail reporting of the experience during the operation of the various scenarios. Step-by-step cookbook and methodological guidelines for the facilitation of behavioural change of citizens.

result.title: EUXDAT Pilots Implementation v1
result.description:
This deliverable represents the first release of the three pilots: optimizing resources management in farms, energy efficiency and 3D farming. They are done by using the EUXDAT e-Infrastructure and in line to its detailed definition.
It also includes a report detailing the implementation, configuration steps and lessons learnt and other feedback about EUXDAT. Such report contains information about the eInfrastructure components qualification in the first release, determining the TRL which corresponds to each one and the missing actions for those not reaching TRL8.

result.title: EUXDAT Pilots Implementation v3
result.description:
This deliverable represents the last release of the three pilots: optimizing resources management in farms, energy efficiency and 3D farming. They are done by using the EUXDAT e-Infrastructure v3 and in line to its detailed definition.
It also includes a report detailing the implementation, configuration steps and lessons learnt. Such report contains information about the last eInfrastructure components qualification, determining the TRL which corresponds to each one and the missing actions for those not reaching TRL8.

result.title: EUXDAT e-Infrastructure Definition v1
result.description: The initial e-Infrastructure definition will list the main set of features to be provided by EUXDAT, the functional blocks, their interactions, the provision plans and an initial roadmap for releasing all the required features. UML diagrams will be included whenever necessary. This version will focus on the functionalities with the highest priority, according to the requirements.

result.title: Description of Proposed Pilots and Requirements
result.description: This report will describe those issues related to data scalabilty detected from different scientific communities, as well as the proposed pilots. The pilots’ descriptions will include information about the domain, the problem description, the selection justification, size and format of data available, computation needs and the main features to implement. This document will also detail the initial set of e-Infrastructure requirements in terms of functional requirements, non-functional requirements, constraints and restrictions.
